title: Certified Auto Mechanic NEW!
full_description: We are looking for a Certified Auto Mechanic to join our team! You will be responsible for repairing various vehicles and transmission systems. Responsibilities:Repair automobiles & trucksSpecialize in vehicle transmission systemsPerform routine vehicle maintenanceUse diagnostic tools to test vehicle componentsPerform quality inspections prior to returning the vehicle to the customerQualifications:Previous experience as a mechanicKnowledge of shop equipmentStrong mechanical aptitude and troubleshooting skillsDeadline and detail-orientedAbility to thrive in a fast-paced environment
